lines.text: Butterball! Butterball blubberbutt! Butterball and the simultaneously released in June the same audience time thing.

[while showing footage of a child molester]
I always love to play with my balls while I watch this part.
Man, I gotta take a dump again.

[farts loudly, then loudly inhaled deeply]
Whoa, ho, man! That was rancid! I wish my fans could get a whiff of that one!

[after the film has ended]
Sniff my sweaty, unwashed butthole.
